title: Congaree National Park: Maps
body: Maps and Brochures      Â    The following are available for download in Adobe PDF format Directions from Columbia Metropolitan Airport - Download (PDF - 199KB) Trail Guide - Download Map Download Trail Descriptions Birds of Congaree National Park- Download (PDF- 161 KB) Trees, Shrubs, and Vines Partial Species List- Download (PDF- 660 KB) Fishing Regulations- Download (PDF-1,318 KB) Congaree History- Download (PDF-1,154 KB) Common Tree Identification- Download (PDF-345 KB) Big Tree Brochure- Download (PDF-889 KB) Mammals, Reptiles, Amphibians Partial Species List- Download (PDF-1.43 MB) Beetles & Mosquitos Partial Species List- Download (PDF-417 KB)
